title: Find an Expert for Interview
description: An agent must find three potential industry experts on a niche topic ('cold chain logistics for pharmaceuticals') to be interviewed for a project.

tasks.description: Search professional networks (like LinkedIn) and academic databases for experts on the specified topic.
Identify three individuals who have published articles or have extensive experience in the field.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a list of three relevant experts.

tasks.description: For each expert, provide their name, current role, and a link to their profile or a relevant publication.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a brief profile for each potential interviewee.
